terms.description: A summary of campaign performance metrics over a week, including impressions, clicks, spend, revenue, and ROAS. Use pacingDataObjectsConnection with date filtering to retrieve this data.

examples.businessQuestion: Show me the weekly performance report for last week

terms.description: Return on Ad Spend - calculated as revenue divided by spend. Available in pacing data which tracks revenue and spend at the campaign/line item level.

examples.businessQuestion: What's our ROAS for last month?

terms.description: Campaign orders represent the business agreements for advertising campaigns, including budgets, schedules, and associated campaigns. They tie together campaigns, line items, and billing.
Advertising campaigns within MediaJel. Campaigns belong to organizations and campaign orders, containing targeting, creative, and budget configurations.

examples.businessQuestion: How do I list all campaigns?

terms.description: Attribution events track customer conversions and actions attributed to advertising campaigns. This includes impressions, clicks, sign-ups, and purchases tied back to specific campaigns.

examples.businessQuestion: Show me attribution data for a campaign

terms.description: Creative assets used in advertising campaigns, including display ads, video ads, and native ad content. Creatives are associated with campaigns and line items.

examples.businessQuestion: List all creatives for a campaign

terms.description: Organizations (advertisers) in MediaJel. Each organization represents a client account with its own campaigns, budgets, and users.
Line items define the specific targeting, bidding, and delivery settings within a campaign order. They control how and where ads are served.

examples.businessQuestion: Get line items for a campaign order

terms.description: Audience segments define groups of users to target based on demographics, behaviors, and other attributes. Used in DemoGraph for precise targeting.
Geographic targeting configurations for campaigns, including zip codes, DMAs, cities, and polygon-based targeting areas.

examples.businessQuestion: Get geo targeting for a line item

terms.description: Pacing data tracks daily spend, impressions, clicks, and revenue for campaigns and line items. Essential for monitoring campaign delivery and performance.

examples.businessQuestion: Get pacing data for a specific campaign

terms.description: Authentication to the MediaJel API using Cognito credentials. Returns JWT tokens (accessToken, idToken, refreshToken) for API access.

examples.businessQuestion: How do I authenticate to the API?

terms.description: Paid search campaigns managed through MediaJel, including Google Ads integrations and search performance tracking.
SEO summaries and performance data tracking organic search visibility and rankings.
Users with access to the MediaJel platform, including their roles and permissions within organizations.
